file_insights.purpose: Barrel export file for project hooks
file_insights.export_strategy: Re-exporting custom hooks with an example usage comment

patterns_discovered: Grouped hook exports in a single index file
gotchas_discovered: Potential naming conflicts if not carefully managed
Need to maintain consistent export patterns across hooks

approach_outcome.primary_goal: Create hook index for easy project-wide importing
approach_outcome.key_result: Created index.ts with exports for useFocusTrap, useModal, and useGoBack

recommendations: Maintain consistent export pattern in hook index file
Add type definitions for better TypeScript support
Consider adding documentation for each exported hook
Implement a strict linting rule to enforce export consistency
